mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, NAME, CODE, COMMENTS, TENANT_ID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, STATUS, APPROVAL_STATUS, SHOW_ORDER, SYSTEM_ID, IS_PUBLIC, UNIT_ID, NAME_FIRST_SPELL

select t.* from T_ROLE t ,t_link_user_role l where t.role_id = l.role_id

mapper.update:
update T_ROLE
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHOW_ORDER = #{showOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT_ID = #{unitId,jdbcType=CHAR},
NAME_FIRST_SPELL = #{nameFirstSpell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=CHAR}

update T_ROLE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHOW_ORDER = #{showOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNIT_ID = #{unitId,jdbcType=CHAR}, NAME_FIRST_SPELL = #{nameFirstSpell,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=CHAR}
